about.label: About
about.title: Eva Ballin, Attorney in Nice
about.description1: Eva Ballin is an attorney at the Nice Bar. She practices primarily in criminal law and white-collar crime, where law meets real life, its tensions, its urgencies, its risks. For her, criminal procedure is not just a framework: it is a field of precision, where every word counts, where every mistake can be costly, and where every irregularity must be identified, discussed, and challenged.
about.description2: Trained for two years at the Institut de Sciences pénales d'Aix-en-Provence (graduated with honors), she holds two Masters degrees in business law and financial crime, as well as a DESU in economic criminal risk. She enriched this background with experience in compliance and anti-money laundering at a Big Four firm in Luxembourg, before joining a white-collar crime law firm in Monaco. Trained by Maître Joseph Cohen Sabban, Maîtres Steeve Ruben and Marie Violleau in Paris, then by Maître Sophie Jonquet in Nice.
about.quote: "Courage, for a lawyer, is essential, without which nothing else matters: talent, culture, knowledge of the law, everything is useful to a lawyer. But without courage, at the decisive moment, there are only words, sentences that follow one another, that shine and die."

expertise.title: Excellence in training
expertise.description: Institut de Sciences pénales d'Aix-en-Provence, two Masters degrees and a DESU in economic criminal risk.

international.title: International dimension
international.description: Experience in Singapore, Dubai, Luxembourg and Monaco. Fluent practice in French and English.

human.title: Attentive and human
human.description: A case never starts with a number: it starts with a story. Listening is the first weapon of defense. Speech is the second.

rigorous.title: Tenacious and rigorous
rigorous.description: Every case is a battle that deserves to be fought to the end, with method, loyalty and determination.

expertises.label: Practice Areas
expertises.title: Areas of Practice
expertises.description: Member of the Nice Bar, practicing throughout France in all forms of criminal law.

penal.title: General Criminal Law
penal.description: Violence, sexual offenses, theft, fraud, breach of trust, harassment, threats, homicide, murder. Assistance from police custody to sentence enforcement before all criminal courts.

business.title: White-Collar Crime
business.description: Misuse of corporate assets, money laundering, tax fraud, fraud, embezzlement of public funds, corruption, undeclared work, moral or sexual harassment, labor law violations.

public.title: Public Criminal Law
public.description: Offenses involving public officials or institutional actors: corruption, illegal taking of interest, favoritism, embezzlement of public funds.

compliance.title: Compliance and CSR
compliance.description: Prevention and management of criminal risks, implementation of compliance programs, internal investigations, social responsibility and ethics policies.

victims.title: Victims' Rights
victims.description: Support at every stage of criminal proceedings, from complaint to hearing, with attention to recognition of their experience and compensation for damages.

press.title: Press Law
press.description: Defamation, insult, reputation damage and press offenses, in defense as well as victim representation.

domestic.label: Focus
domestic.title: Domestic Violence
domestic.description1: Eva Ballin handles domestic violence situations with a particular requirement: urgency, protection and respect for victims' voices.
domestic.description2: These cases require acting quickly, but never lightly. She supports victims in a secure environment, listening to their choices, while building procedural strategies designed to protect them concretely.
domestic.description3: Her goal is twofold: ensure immediate safety and enable the person she supports to regain control of their life, legally and humanly.

services.3: Filing with the family court judge

domestic.emergency: If you are in immediate danger, contact 17 (Police) or 3919 (Women Violence Info).

fees.label: Fees
fees.title: Fee Transparency
fees.description: Fees are set transparently, according to the nature and complexity of the case. A fee agreement is systematically established before any intervention.

consultation.title: Consultation
consultation.description: First meeting to analyze your situation and advise on the strategy to adopt.

forfait.title: Fixed Fee
forfait.description: For procedures whose scope can be anticipated, a global fixed fee may be proposed.

hourly.title: Hourly Rate
hourly.description: For cases requiring regular follow-up or whose evolution is uncertain.

legal_aid.title: Legal Aid
legal_aid.description: Possibility of intervention under legal aid subject to resource conditions.

contact.label: Contact

contact.description: For any consultation or information request, please do not hesitate to contact me. I will respond as soon as possible.
